schools.name: Freeburg Primary Center
schools.school-summary: Freeburg Primary Center, a public school located in Freeburg, IL, serves grades PK-2 in the Freeburg Central Consolidated School District 70.
schools.rating-description: The GreatSchools Rating helps parents compare schools within a state based on a variety of school quality indicators and provides a helpful picture of how effectively each school serves all of its students. Ratings are on a scale of 1 (below average) to 10 (above average) and can include test scores, college readiness, academic progress, advanced courses, equity, discipline and attendance data. We also advise parents to visit schools, consider other information on school performance and programs, and consider family needs as part of the school selection process.

schools.name: Freeburg Community High School
schools.school-summary: Freeburg Community High School, a public school located in Freeburg, IL, serves grades 9-12 in the Freeburg Chsd 77 School District.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 9 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.

schools.name: Freeburg Elementary School
schools.school-summary: Freeburg Elementary School, a public school located in Freeburg, IL, serves grades 3-8 in the Freeburg Central Consolidated School District 70.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 8 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
